name: alesitom/hybrid-id
description: Compact, time-sortable unique ID generator for PHP. Drop-in UUID/ULID alternative with base62 encoding, Stripe-style prefixes, and configurable entropy profiles.

suggest.vlucas/phpdotenv: Load HYBRID_ID_PROFILE and HYBRID_ID_NODE from .env files (^5.6)
suggest.alesitom/hybrid-id-laravel: Laravel integration — Eloquent trait, service provider, and config
suggest.alesitom/hybrid-id-doctrine: Doctrine integration — DBAL type and ORM ID generator
